message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire our premium product. Given its exceptional value and quality, it's worth noting that the product holds a significant significance to me, reflecting over $10,000 in personal investment. Considering its immense worth to you, valued at $8,000, I am extending this exclusive offer. I kindly propose a transaction price of $9,500, aiming to ensure mutual satisfaction while respecting the product's intrinsic value. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful business exchange.
